verses.text:
I will follow thee, my Saviour,
Wherever thou dost go;
I will learn of thee, my Master,
All I ought to know.

Thou didst call me to thy service,
And I answered, 'Here am I!'
Send me where thou wilt, my Master,
I will follow thee on high.

I will join the mighty chorus
Of thy servants round thy throne;
I will be thy faithful follower,
Thine, and thine alone.

I will follow thee, my Saviour,
Through the darkest, deepest night;
I will trust in thee, my Master,
Till the day breaks bright.

chorus.text:
I will follow thee, my Saviour,
Wherever thou dost lead;
I will trust in thee, my Master,
Thou wilt supply my need.
